title: What is it like to work in the mafia or triad or yakuza? - Quora
tags: What Is It Like to Work With Y?
Yakuza (organized crime syndicates originating in Japan)

response.answer_text: I am not a Mafia member, made or not (I'm not even Italian) but my cousin’s ex was a made guy from a NYC family (likely Genovese or Gambino) and he had to pay weekly dues to his capo but he was also untouchable and was able to run his own crew of associates an 2–3 other soldiers without intervention. I hung out with a gang that worked for this guy and usually it was break ins, extortion, carjackings/chop shops, truck hijackings, collecting loans, and some drug sales (this wasn't even with the Mob guys, this was in the ‘'farm team’) and I got a pretty small cut (like 20%) of whatever I made. That life is behind me now.

Don't personally know, but every gang has their rules of entry, from there I guess it is like any organized crime syndicate, low key, very little "wet works" aka killing jobs involved in daily activities. BTW, why even ask such a question that will get you under suspicion!!
